title: Bumps in the Night
description: Dudley the Stork's new house is haunted!When the clock strikes twelve there are thumps in the den, creaks on the stairs, and bumps everywhere.Dudley's friend Trevor Hog says Madam Kreepy will find out what's causing the spooky noises.And so, just before midnight, Dudley's friends gather with Madam Kreepy.No one can guess what will happen when the clock strikes twelve.From the Hardcover edition.
author: Harry Allard
